root.name: Assault Suit Leynos 2
root.description: OverviewA side scrolling mech game in the same series as Cybernator. You control a mech that goes around blowing up tanks, helicopters and other mechs. Along the way you can switch between weapons on the fly in order to combat your enemies easier. A shield can be used to defect shots as well but like all your tools they eventually run out. Near the end of most stages you should expect a gigantic boss of some kind to stop you from progressing.
